title: [LFM] Recruiting D5+ Mid (Semi-Serious)
body:
Hey Everyone, our freshly created ranked 5s '2Desire' is currently recruiting and we will be playing semi-seriously practising hard this preseason, and being prepared for the upcoming season 6.

Our Requirements are as follows:
Mic Required✔
Skype Required ✔
Your Profile must have at least 2 most played Champions corresponding to your main role, out of your most played 5. ✔
Having Extensive knowledge of playing your main role, diversity champion pools corresponding to your lane, Current Meta Etc. ✔
Positive Attitude and a common sense of humour c: ✔

I'm recruiting specifically for Mid, will be having trial games.

Add me if you're interested or have any enquiries, IGN: Creative Self
